rules_text:
{T}: Target fortified land is a 2/2 Angel creature with flying until end of turn.
Whenever an Angel you control enters or dies, you gain 1 life and surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
Fortify {1} [i]({1}: Attach to target land you control. Fortify only as a sorcery.)[/i]
